author: Laura Hoy
title: History Tells Us Don’t Trust This Stock Market Recovery
description: U.S. stocks are in recovery mode thanks to fiscal stimulus, but history shows us the rally cannot be trusted. The post History Tells Us Don’t Trust This Stock Market Recovery appeared first on CCN.com
content:
• The stock markets recovery is little more than a dead cat bounce as more bad news is likely on the horizon.
  • Historical data say the market will see wild swings before finally returning to an upward trend.
